name: Nuggets Maker – Preschool fast food cooking game and free fried chicken invaders
name_original: Nuggets Maker – Preschool fast food cooking game and free fried chicken invaders
description:
Check out our new kitchen adventure cooking game “Nuggets Maker”. Select the ingredients of your choice firstly and then chop the chicken pieces. Flip and fry the yummy nuggets and enjoy them alongside different other things. Isn’t it exciting? So download it now for free and enjoy!

HOW TO PLAY:
======================
•Select the ingredients
•Chop the chicken pieces
•Prepare the nuggets
•Share it with your friends and family on Facebook

FEATURES:
======================
•Easy tap and drag game play.
•Kids friendly content
•Backgrounds and wallpaper personalization
•Suitable for the whole family
•Cool BG music and HD graphics

=== YOU ARE SWEET ===
Your support by good reviews and ratings would help us to always provide you with free and cool apps and games; so don’t hesitate to give good ratings and reviews. We always welcome your feedback and any cool ideas about our games, to improve continuously; you might be willing to share at playinkstudio@gmail.com

=== JOIN US ON FACEBOOK ===
There are some exclusive news, updates and secret tips and tricks for you about our games at facebook,
https://www.facebook.com/PizzaSandwichStand
https://www.facebook.com/playinkstudio

OK then enjoy & Good Bye!
